attributes.action: Ensure that anyone on the Sex Offender's Register, or convicted of offences against children should not be able to work on a self-employed basis.  Tracking and monitoring is virtually impossible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Please remove reference to the individual case you are referring to and resubmit your petition.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
